title: Survey Data Entry Specialist
requirements: Must be legally authorized to work in the U.S. (citizen, green card, EAD)
Origin from Bangladesh and Pakistan are not allowed
Quiet home workspace with reliable internet (minimum 25 Mbps)
responsibilities: Validate data against quality control standards
shortDescription: Remote data entry position processing survey responses with quality control responsibilities.
description: Join our Data Operations team as we process over 50,000 monthly survey responses from market research studies. You'll be trained on our proprietary data entry platform and quality assurance protocols. After the initial 2-week training period, you'll be expected to maintain 200+ daily entries with 98% accuracy. The role includes weekly team meetings and monthly one-on-ones with your supervisor. We provide all necessary software - you just need a Windows/Mac computer with dual monitor capability (we provide a stipend for second monitor purchase).

title: Survey Support Specialist
workHours: Shifts between 8:00 AM - 8:00 PM EST (Rotating weekends)
requirements: Origin from Bangladesh and Pakistan are not allowed
responsibilities: Escalate technical issues to Tier 2 support
shortDescription: Provide frontline support for survey participants via email and live chat.
description: As the first point of contact for our survey platform users, you'll resolve technical issues, answer eligibility questions, and ensure positive participant experiences. After completing our 3-week paid training program (including product knowledge and de-escalation techniques), you'll join a team of 15 support professionals handling 10,000+ monthly inquiries. Metrics include response time (under 2 minutes for chat), resolution rate (85% first contact), and customer satisfaction scores. Growth paths include Quality Assurance coaching or Team Lead positions.

title: Field Research Coordinator
requirements: Must reside within 30 miles of posted location
Valid driver's license and clean record
Origin from Bangladesh and Pakistan are not allowed
responsibilities: Approach 100+ participants weekly at designated locations
Accurately record responses in SurveyCTO app
shortDescription: Conduct in-person surveys at retail locations and public venues.
description: Our field team collects crucial consumer insights at shopping malls, grocery stores, and public events. You'll complete a 1-week paid training covering research ethics, approach techniques, and data collection protocols. Daily expectations include visiting 3-4 pre-assigned locations, obtaining 15-20 completed surveys per location, and securely transmitting data. We provide all equipment including tablet, branded vest, and collateral materials. This position involves significant walking/standing and interaction with diverse populations. Advancement opportunities include Field Supervisor or Project Coordinator roles.

title: Associate Front-End Developer
workHours: Flexible within core hours 10:00 AM - 3:00 PM EST
requirements: Origin from Bangladesh and Pakistan are not allowed
responsibilities: Implement UI components from Figma designs
Write unit tests for new components
shortDescription: Entry-level developer position maintaining survey platform front-end.
description: Join our 12-person engineering team maintaining a platform serving 500,000+ monthly users. You'll work primarily in our React/TypeScript codebase under the guidance of senior developers. The first 3 months include structured onboarding with weekly pairing sessions and progressively complex tickets. Expect to spend 60% on feature development, 30% bug fixes, and 10% professional development. We follow Agile methodology with 2-week sprints and biweekly retrospectives. Performance reviews at 3, 6, and 12 months determine promotion to Mid-Level Developer.

title: Market Research Assistant
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Social Sciences, Business, or related field
Must be authorized to work in the U.S.
Origin from Bangladesh and Pakistan are not allowed
responsibilities: Conduct quality checks on research instruments
Support senior researchers with ad-hoc tasks
shortDescription: Support our research team with data preparation and basic analysis tasks.
description: Join our growing research team as we deliver insights to Fortune 500 clients. You'll work closely with project managers to prepare client-ready deliverables, ensuring data accuracy and visual clarity. The first month includes intensive training on our research methodologies and reporting standards. This role serves as a gateway to more advanced analyst positions - 60% of our Research Assistants are promoted within 18 months. Ideal for recent graduates looking to launch their market research careers.

title: IT Help Desk Technician
workHours: Rotating shifts covering 7:00 AM - 7:00 PM local time
requirements: CompTIA A+ certification (or willingness to obtain within 3 months)
Associate's degree in IT or related field
Origin from Bangladesh and Pakistan are not allowed
shortDescription: Frontline technical support for our corporate offices.
description: As the face of our IT department, you'll provide white-glove service to 150+ employees across our three office locations. This role combines technical problem-solving with exceptional customer service - you'll handle everything from password resets to hardware configurations. Our structured 90-day onboarding includes shadowing senior technicians and progressive responsibility increases. The IT team operates on a follow-the-sun model with opportunities to transition to night shift or sysadmin roles after 12 months. Must be comfortable working in-office with occasional after-hours support rotations.

title: Junior Web Designer
workHours: Flexible within core hours 10:00 AM - 3:00 PM CST
requirements: Origin from Bangladesh and Pakistan are not allowed
shortDescription: Entry-level design role with flexible location options.
description: Work alongside our Creative Director and marketing team to produce visually compelling digital experiences. This role offers both remote and in-office (Austin) options - remote team members receive monthly co-working stipends. You'll start with smaller design tasks (buttons, form fields, icons) before progressing to complete page layouts. Our 6-month ramp-up program includes weekly design critiques and UX fundamentals training. Ideal for recent graduates or career changers building their digital design portfolio. Tools provided include Figma Organization, Adobe Creative Cloud, and access to our design system library.
